lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Now, let's learn how to rotate.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Use your left joystick or WASD keys to rotate.
You cannot turn when your feet are on ground. You need to move one leg to turn around the other foot.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Try to avoid these obstacles by rotating around them!
You have 30 seconds to reach the end of this path once you passed the start line. Good luck!

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Great! Now that you can rotate, let's learn how to move backward.
On keyboard, press ctrl + left/right arrow keys.
On gamepad, press the triggers instead of the buttons.

lines.speaker: Camarade
text: Well done! You've mastered rotating and moving backward.
Let's pass to the next lesson!
